description: Tiny Calculator using eval method of JavaScript to solve the equations enclosed in it.

name: Eyeball Tracking Movement
description: This is a tiny project which will track the mouse movement and the eyes in the page will follow the mouse.

name: Random Color Generator
description: This is a tiny project for generating attractive random colors. To see the demo, click the 'generate' button to generate a new color.

name: Random Gradient Generator
description: This is a tiny project for generating attractive random Gradients. To see the demo, click the 'generate' button to generate a new gradient.

name: Password Generator
description: This is a tiny project which will create a strong password by clicking on GENERATE PASSWORD.

name: GitHub Profile Finder
description: A page where you can search GitHub users using there username. The project uses API provided by GitHub itself.

name: Geometric Art
description: Geometric art generator which was created to just practice javascript.
